products.title: City bike
products.description: A high-quality bicycle designed for city riding, with a focus on comfort and durability.

products.title: Racer bike
products.description: Perfect for longer distances with smooth-rolling wheels and an ergonomic seating position.

products.title: Mountainbike
products.description: Robust mountain bike for adventures in the forest and on rough trails.

products.title: Bottle holder
products.description: Lightweight aluminum bottle holder, easy to mount on all bike frames.

products.title: Bags and storage
products.description: Waterproof bike bag with ample space for personal belongings and tools.

products.title: Helmet
products.description: Safe and comfortable bike helmet with adjustable fit and good ventilation.

products.title: Tires
products.description: Puncture-resistant tires with good grip in all weather conditions.

products.title: Saddle
products.description: Ergonomically designed saddle for maximum comfort on longer rides.

products.title: Handlebars
products.description: Lightweight aluminum handlebars with a comfortable grip surface.

products.title: Dark roast
products.description: Intense and rich coffee with notes of chocolate and caramel, perfect for espresso.

products.title: Light roast
products.description: Fresh and fruity coffee with a lighter roast, highlighting the coffee's natural sweetness.

products.title: Espresso machines
products.description: Professional espresso machine for home use with precise temperature control.

products.title: Coffee grinders
products.description: Conical grinder with 40 settings for optimal grinding for any brewing method.

products.title: Aeropress
products.description: Innovative coffee press that combines immersion and pressure filtering for a clean cup of coffee.

products.title: Portafilter
products.description: High-quality portafilter in stainless steel, compatible with most espresso machines.

products.title: Coffee scales
products.description: Precise digital scale with a timer, ideal for consistent coffee brewing.

products.title: Baskets
products.description: High-quality precision filter baskets for optimal extraction.
